title: Browser support
contents:
mode_edit

瀏覽器支援link

Browser supportlink

Angular 支援大多數常用瀏覽器，包括下列版本：

Angular supports most recent browsers. This includes the following specific versions:

瀏覽器Browser 支援的版本Supported versions
Chrome 最近的兩個版本2 most recent versions
Firefox 最新版以及擴充支援版本（ESR）latest and extended support release (ESR)
Edge 最近的兩個主版本2 most recent major versions
Safari 最近的兩個主版本2 most recent major versions
iOS 最近的兩個主版本2 most recent major versions
Android 最近的兩個主版本2 most recent major versions

Angular 的持續整合過程會在每次 Pull Request 時透過 Sauce Labs 在所有瀏覽器上執行本框架的單元測試。

Angular's continuous integration process runs unit tests of the framework on all of these browsers for every pull request, using Sauce Labs.

Polyfill指令碼（polyfill）link

Polyfillslink

Angular 構建於 Web 平台的最新標準之上。要支援這麼多瀏覽器是一個不小的挑戰，因為它們不支援現代瀏覽器的所有特性。你可以透過載入Polyfill指令碼（"polyfills"）來為想要支援的瀏覽器彌補這些特性。下面講解了如何將Polyfill指令碼包含到你的專案中。

Angular is built on the latest standards of the web platform. Targeting such a wide range of browsers is challenging because they do not support all features of modern browsers. You compensate by loading polyfill scripts ("polyfills") for the browsers that you must support. See instructions on how to include polyfills into your project below.

建議使用的Polyfill指令碼是用於執行完整 Angular 應用程式的。你可能需要其他Polyfill指令碼來支援本列表未曾涵蓋的特性。

The suggested polyfills are the ones that run full Angular applications. You might need additional polyfills to support features not covered by this list.

注意：
Polyfill指令碼並不能神奇地將老舊、慢速的瀏覽器變成現代、快速的瀏覽器。

NOTE:
Polyfills cannot magically transform an old, slow browser into a modern, fast one.

在 CLI 專案中啟用Polyfill指令碼link

Enabling polyfills with CLI projectslink

Angular CLI 提供了對Polyfill指令碼的支援。如果未使用 CLI 建立專案，參閱針對非 CLI 使用者的Polyfill指令碼說明。

The Angular CLI provides support for polyfills. If you are not using the CLI to create your projects, see Polyfill instructions for non-CLI users.

browser 和 test 建構器的 polyfills 選項可以是到一個檔案的完整路徑（比如 src/polyfills.ts）或相對於當前工作空間或模組的識別符號（比如 zone.js）。

The polyfills options of the browser and test builder can be a full path for a file (Example: src/polyfills.ts) or, relative to the current workspace or module specifier (Example: zone.js).

如果你建立了某個 TypeScript 檔案，請確保 tsconfig 檔案的 files 屬性中包含了它。

If you create a TypeScript file, make sure to include it in the files property of your tsconfig file.

{ "extends": "./tsconfig.json", "compilerOptions": { ... }, "files": [ "src/main.ts", "src/polyfills.ts" ] ... }

非 CLI 的使用者的Polyfill指令碼link

Polyfills for non-CLI userslink

如果你不使用 CLI，就要直接把Polyfill指令碼新增到宿主頁（index.html）中，就像這樣：。

If you are not using the CLI, add your polyfill scripts directly to the host web page (index.html).

比如：

For example:

<!-- pre-zone polyfills --> <script src="node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js"></script> <script> /** * you can configure some zone flags which can disable zone interception for some * asynchronous activities to improve startup performance - use these options only * if you know what you are doing as it could result in hard to trace down bugs. */ // __Zone_disable_requestAnimationFrame = true; // disable patch requestAnimationFrame // __Zone_disable_on_property = true; // disable patch onProperty such as onclick // __zone_symbol__UNPATCHED_EVENTS = ['scroll', 'mousemove']; // disable patch specified eventNames /* * in Edge developer tools, the addEventListener will also be wrapped by zone.js * with the following flag, it will bypass `zone.js` patch for Edge. */ // __Zone_enable_cross_context_check = true; </script> <!-- zone.js required by Angular --> <script src="node_modules/zone.js/bundles/zone.umd.js"></script> <!-- application polyfills -->
最後複查時間：11/4/2022
